HISTORY OF PRESENT ILLNESS : Postoperatively , she had a rather prolonged episode of ileus . She also had some respiratory problems requiring formal chest physical therapy and otherwise did quite well . Her postoperative creatinine was 0.8 . Electrolytes were 135 , 4.5 , chloride 101 , CO2 31 , hematocrit 34.8 . Preoperative evaluation revealed bone scan with no evidence of metastatic disease . Electrocardiogram showed sinus bradycardia . She will be follow up as an outpatient after her discharge . NAMAIREGID SHUFF , M.D. TR : DD : 6/5/95 TD : 06/09/95 Dr. The Vein
